thread.title: US women to play China on Dec 13 at Glendale, Arizona
thread.title_full: US women to play China on Dec 13 at Glendale, Arizona

title: US women to play China on Dec 13 at Glendale, Arizona
text:
Sports US women to play China on Dec 13 at Glendale, Arizona United States women’s national soccer team’s Shannon Boxx, left, watches as Christie Rampone lifts Boxx’s daughter Zoe Spearman, 20 months, after a soccer practice Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015, in Seattle. The team plays a friendly match against Brazil on Wednesday, ... more > By - Associated   
CHICAGO (AP) - The U.S. women’s soccer team will play China in an exhibition at Glendale, Arizona, on Dec. 13 as part of its victory tour, a rematch of the Americans’ 1-0 win in a quarterfinal at this year’s World Cup. 
The U.S. has six remaining exhibitions this year, starting with Brazil on Wednesday at Seattle. The Americans also play Brazil on Saturday in Orlando, Florida. 
The December schedule includes matches against Trinidad and Tobago on Dec. 6 at Honolulu, Dec. 10 at San Antonio, and China on Dec. 16 at New Orleans.
